duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell products and services to customers to enhance their lives and make things easier
Maximize sales opportunities and earn as much as $26/hour or more - it's really up to you
Access to company benefits including medical, dental effective on day one, life insurance, 401k, pension eligibility, tuition reimbursement, adoption assistance, and more
Participate in ongoing training and personal development with advancement opportunities in as little as 6 months
